name: Hibiscus Bloom
description: This is our signature color journal. Just like a cherry on a decadent sundae, this journal will make you feel like you are on top of the world. This cheery color will brighten your day and bring energy and vibrancy in your life. Each journal comes with a 100 page spiral bound notebook inside that can easily be replaced once filled. You will also have a zipper pocket to keep business cards, mementos or anything you''d like. There is also a business card size holder to keep your business card or information. Your life is valuable and your journal should be just as special to keep your treasured moments. outside dimensions: Leather Exterior 7 1/2" (width) x 9 1/2"(width) x 1"(height) Pen holder for up to 1/2" in diameter Leather Magnetic closure inside specs: 100% Cotton Lining Front: • 1- 9 1/2" x 4 1/2" zipper pocket Back: • 1 - 4 1/4" x 2 1/2" credit card/business card wallet inside specs: • Removable 8 1/2" x 6" Notebook which includes: 100 pages (lined or unlined) PVC White Spiral binding Choose Your Fabric and ruled or unruled notebook:

options.name: Paisley Pink Interior with ruled notebook
Paisley Pink Interior with unruled notebook
Tropical Jungle Interior with ruled notebook
Tropical Jungle Interior with unruled notebook

name: Tropical Palm
description: When we see the color green, we always think of renewal. Just like everything blooms in the spring, this journal will have you feeling washed clean. Each journal comes with a 100 page spiral bound notebook inside that can easily be replaced once filled. You will also have a zipper pocket to keep business cards, mementos or anything you'd like. There is also a business card size holder to keep your business card or information. name: Aqua Spray
description: When you choose this journal, it is like taking a day at the beach with the waves lapping at your feet and the sun warming your skin. This was the inspiration behind choosing this leather color. Each time you grab this journal, you can have the "day at the beach" feeling no matter where you are. Each journal comes with a 100 page spiral bound notebook inside that can easily be replaced once filled. You will also have a zipper pocket to keep business cards, mementos or anything you''d like. There is also a business card size holder to keep your business card or information. Your life is valuable and your journal should be just as special to keep your treasured moments. outside dimensions: Leather Exterior 7 1/2" (width) x 9 1/2"(width) x 1"(height) Pen holder for up to 1/2" in diameter Leather Magnetic closure inside specs: 100% Cotton Lining Front: • 1- 9 1/2" x 4 1/2" zipper pocket Back: • 1 - 4 1/4" x 2 1/2" credit card/business card wallet inside specs: • Removable 8 1/2" x 6" Notebook which includes: 100 pages (lined or unlined) PVC White Spiral binding Choose Your Fabric and ruled or unruled notebook:

name: Purple Sunset
description: The inspiration for this journal color came from watching one of our many Florida sunsets and how there are vibrant oranges, purples and pinks in the sky. There is nothing like watching the sun go to bed at night for the start of a fresh new day. Each journal comes with a 100 page spiral bound notebook inside that can easily be replaced once filled. You will also have a zipper pocket to keep business cards, mementos or anything you''d like. There is also a business card size holder to keep your business card or information. Your life is valuable and your journal should be just as special to keep your treasured moments. outside dimensions: Leather Exterior 7 1/2" (width) x 9 1/2"(width) x 1"(height) Pen holder for up to 1/2" in diameter Leather Magnetic closure inside specs: 100% Cotton Lining Front: • 1- 9 1/2" x 4 1/2" zipper pocket Back: • 1 - 4 1/4" x 2 1/2" credit card/business card wallet inside specs: • Removable 8 1/2" x 6" Notebook which includes: 100 pages (lined or unlined) PVC White Spiral binding Choose Your Fabric and ruled or unruled notebook:

name: Purple Sunset Notebook Refill
description:
Need a refill? This notebook fits your Sheic Journal perfectly. Buy more than one for different uses and interchange them in your journal.
